Hellfire Unleashed.name: Hellfire Unleashed
Hellfire Unleashed.flavor: Hellish fire erupts within your enemy, while black smoke poisons the air around it.
Hellfire Unleashed.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier fire and poison damage. Each creature adjacent to the target takes 5 poison damage and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Infernal Guardian.name: Infernal Guardian
Infernal Guardian.flavor: A sinister figure formed from hellfire appears beside you to protect you from harm.
Infernal Guardian.effect: You conjure an infernal guardian in an unoccupied square adjacent to you. The guardian lasts until the end of your next turn. While you are adjacent to the guardian, you are immune to charm effects and fear effects, and you gain resist 10 fire.

Fiery Companions.name: Fiery Companions
Fiery Companions.flavor: Fire erupts across your body as you scream the word to rip open reality and call forth fiends to aid you.
Fiery Companions.effect: You conjure four fiery fiends in four unoccupied squares in the burst. The fiends occupy their squares, and they last until the end of your next turn. Any creature that leaves a square adjacent to a fiend on its turn takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). When the fiends appear, they each make the following melee attack (determine line of sight from each fiend). A fiend attacks an ally if no enemies are adjacent to it.
Fiery Companions.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Fiery Companions.sustainMinor: The fiends persist. As a standard action, you can cause each of the fiends to make its attack again. As before, a fiend attacks an ally if no enemies are adjacent to it.
